title: Fluorescent Graphene Quantum Dots-Enhanced Machine Learning for Accurate Detection and Quantification of Hg2+ and Fe3+ in Real Water Samples
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00702B, Paper
Mauricio Llaver, Santiago Daniel Barrionuevo, Jorge Martín Martin Nuñez, Agostina Chapana, Rodolfo G. Wuilloud, Myriam Haydee Aguirre, Francisco Javier Ibañez
Selective, accurate, fast, and with minimal usage of instrumentation has become paramount nowadays in areas of environmental monitoring. Here, we chemically modified fluorescent graphene quantum dots (GQDs) and trained a...
